cmp: 乙 ("B" (in a sequence of examples involving "A", "B", "C", etc.)/2nd heavenly stem/2nd in order)
mng: to dig, to excavate, to scoop out

exm.mng: to speak sarcastically, to make cutting remarks
to excavate, to dig, to unearth
to dig out, to excavate, to scoop out
to poach (talent, personnel from competitors), to raid (a competitor for its talent), Taiwan pr. [wa1 jiao3]
to dig for thoughts (idiom); to search everything for an answer, to rack one's brains
